Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its worth and the benefits it can bring to you, I am extending an exclusive offer of $10000. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations and budget. I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
